column4: my computer's manual mentions that my laptop has a maximum memory of 2gb, why is that ?
b/c they had to limit it somewhere
so if i put a 2gb stick on top of the 1gb built in
no it will not... your computer may not even recognize the 2GB stick... max 2 GB means your best off going with 2 1GB sticks
umm any way i can overcome that ?
